name: Mallard Madness
description:
======【 ＭＡＬＬＡＲＤ ＭＡＤＮＥＳＳ】======

---------------------- An Epic Duck Game ----------------------

============【 ＣＯＮＴＲＯＬＳ】============

  WASD - Move & Jump (you can double-jump)

  Move Mouse - Aim

  Click - Shoot

  Space - Break Le Eg

============== 【 Ｓｔｏｒｙ】 ==============

  Frogs are cringe bro, so go beat em' up or 

  something... Also you're a duck.
